channel.title: Bots on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Bots on Orange Academy

item.title: Intro to Slackbot
item.description: Learning Objectives This is an introduction to using the Slack Client Python API to create a simple bot.

item.title: Coding Our First Bot
item.description: We’ve got everything we need to write the Starter Bot code. Navigate to starterBot directory.

item.title: Labs
item.description: Create a class called Bot() that: Gets the ID of all “bot users” Writes a message to slack channel whenever the bot is mentioned List all usernames along with any message sent by a specific user in the channel.
